name: Bombing Boy
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows (Move) + Space (Confirm / Bomb)
  • Dpad (Move) + A Button (Confirm / Bomb)

Features:

  • Smooth player movement
  • 2 Power Ups (+1 bomb and +1 bomb range)
  • Enemy movement
  • Level generator
  • Menu screen
  • Simple Collision Checker
  • 'Sprite Strip' Animation System
  • And more...

Enjoy :)
